name: 宝琳娜·阿尔瓦雷斯
name_full: 宝琳娜·阿尔瓦雷斯 Paulina Alvarez
introduction: Paulina Alvarez is a Cuban-American actress born and raised in Miami, FL. She received her Bachelor's degree from The University of Southern California's School of Cinematic Arts and is fluent in both English and Spanish. She is known for her work on FBI: International (CBS), S.W.A.T. (CBS), Party of Five (Freeform), Shameless (Showtime), and more.
